alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 1:51AM MDT until November 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches west of Nugget Canyon, including Sage Junction and Cokeville. Accumulations of 1 to 2 inches around Kemmerer. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 50 mph. * WHERE...South Lincoln County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads could become slick and hazardous at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is likely to fall this afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The combination of snow and wind will lead to reduced visibility along US 30. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
